sysevent_email_action.message_html:
${sys_created_on}

 

Dear ${name},


Thank you for taking the time to fill out the Li-Fraumeni Syndrome Study (LFSS) screener questionnaire on our CHARMS website. This notice is your third and FINAL request for additional enrollment information for the LFSS study.  If you do not complete the Field Consent Form as requested below, your CHARMS account will be suspended and your enrollment in the study halted. 

 

The LFS study is being conducted by the Clinical Genetics Branch (CGB), which is a branch within the National Cancer Institute (NCI) at the National Institutes of Health (NIH), part of the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services.  The funding for this research comes directly from the Federal Government. CGB studies genetics as the cause of cancer and the relationship between genetic and environmental risk factors in the development of cancer. Our mission is to learn how to improve the care provided to persons at increased genetic cancer risk, and to reduce the chances of developing cancers and other serious illnesses that are directly associated with changes in certain genes known to cause inherited cancer. The LFSS’s Principal Investigator is Dr. Payal Khincha, M.D., pediatric hematologist-oncologist. 

 

We would like to invite you to participate in this study.  If you would like to participate, we ask that you provide written informed consent and complete the additional enrollment forms so we can confirm that you are eligible for this study and proceed with the enrollment process. Now that your profile as been determined as eligible, please log back into the CHARMS website.  Once you log in, you will see the LFSS Field Consent Form.  Please read through this document carefully and electronically sign if it you would like to participate.  Once this signature is applied, the study consent will go to the Principal Investigator for signature as well.  After the Principal Investigator’s signature is applied, you will have the opportunity to print a copy of the consent for your records.

By signing the Field Consent Form, you are formally agreeing to join the study and to fill out the additional questionnaires. You are also giving us permission to collect blood and tissue specimens, if applicable, so that we can investigate the underlying genetic change(s) associated with Li-Fraumeni Syndrome in your family, and other research goals. Please note that this time we are not adding newly enrolled participants to the cancer screening portion of the study.

If you have any questions regarding the study that you would like to have answered before you sign the consent form, please contact our Family Studies Referral Nurse or me by phone (1-800-518-8474) or by email (JanetBracci@westat.com).

 

Once the Field Consent Form is completed by you and the Principal Investigator, you will receive an email from us informing you that the next phase of the enrollment process is open.  In this second phase, we will ask you for more detailed family and personal health information.  Please try to gather as much of this as possible before starting the next phase.  

Please note that we are authorized to collect the information that we are requesting from you, under the legislative authority for the National Cancer Institute, 42 U.S.C. 285. All information obtained is confidential, and we are bound by law to protect your rights to privacy and confidentiality, under the provisions of the Federal Privacy Act of 1974 (5 U.S.C. 552A). Participation in this research study is completely voluntary, and you have the right to decline participation in any or all parts of the study or to withdraw from the study at a later date, if you change your mind.

Thank you for your interest and participation. We look forward to working with you and your family.  By working together, we have the opportunity to learn important new information about the causes, challenges and management of the Li-Fraumeni Syndrome.

 

With best regards,

Janet Bracci
sysevent_email_action.name: FCSMS - Consent Reminder FINAL REMINDER
sysevent_email_action.subject: Consent Reminder Placeholder - FINAL REMINDER
